thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent as always
thread.title_full: Excellent as always - Review of Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Rachel J
title: Excellent as always
text: We can always rely on Premier Inn to have the company flag flying. The standards of cleanliness are second to none and the staff here were lovely, efficient and friendly. The breakfast was great and we left feeling refreshed and ready to face the day and the journey home. Well recommended.
